frontmatter.title: God does the impossible!
frontmatter.description: What is the the Sword of the Spirit. It's the Word of God. It's your weapon against the enemy. It's sharper than any double-edged sword!

frontmatter.title: Introducing the Sword of the Spirit
frontmatter.description: What is the the Sword of the Spirit. It's the Word of God. It's your weapon against the enemy. It's sharper than any double-edged sword!

frontmatter.title: True meaning of Christmas
frontmatter.description: What is Christmas about? Why do we celebrate it? These are all some great questions. Let's take a look at the true meaning of Christmas

frontmatter.title: Latest Updates!
frontmatter.description: It's been awhile since you guys have heard from me. Some of you may be wondering what happened to me?

frontmatter.title: Happy Thanksgiving
frontmatter.description: We can give thanks to God in all times in life. God deserves all our praise

verses.overrideVerse:
[6] Train up a child in the way he should go;
        even when he is old he will not depart from it. (ESV)
[4] Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord. (ESV)
[21] Fathers, do not provoke your children, lest they become discouraged. (ESV)

[24] Whoever spares the rod hates his son,
        but he who loves him is diligent to discipline him. (ESV)
[29] Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear. (ESV)
[17] Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow due to change. (ESV)

[17] Discipline your son, and he will give you rest;
        he will give delight to your heart. (ESV)

[13] As a father shows compassion to his children,
        so the LORD shows compassion to those who fear him. (ESV)
[8] But if anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for members of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever. (ESV)
[4] He must manage his own household well, with all dignity keeping his children submissive, (ESV)
[6] do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. (ESV)
[16] All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, (ESV)
